title: Strengthening Practical Skills Through Horticulture Problem-Centered Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Problem-solving learning activities in mobile environments for current horticulture practitioners, with continuous feedback via formative assessments

learning_goals: Systematically analyze unstructured problems occurring in actual horticulture settings and propose solutions
Demonstrate leadership, critical thinking, and conflict management skills through collaboration
Utilize digital tools to develop a production plan for 5kg-scale baby greens and quantitatively report execution results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
